text: Tomaloke sihamtara ocarata ubhati ahile sihamte tomalokara ocarata ajuhata dekhuraaba. Koraa, ‘tomaloke ajuhata nedekhuraaba, ami tomalokaka ketiya'o bisbasa nakaraima; niscaya allahe amaka tomalokara bisaye jana'i diche arau allahe arasye tomalokara karyakalapa dekhiba arau te'omra raachule'o. Tara pichata tomalokaka adrsya arau prakasyara mahajnanira ocaralaike ubhata'i niya ha’ba tetiya teraemi tomalokaka janaba tomaloke ki karaichila’
